Articles.Content:
I have the steam version of KSP and tried to install the update but nothing happened. I then did a full reinstall and I am still getting the same trouble. I have also tried to verify integrity of game cache already as well, as people have suggested. I want to play so bad!! Help me please, if you can! I still get the version number on the right low corner reading v.25.0.642.

Thanks!

Moved to Support.

What OS are you installing KSP on?

Also, check KSP's Properties dialog. In the Betas tab, make sure that Last Stable Release is not selected.
